version_description:
Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Minor bug fixes throughout

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Fixed bug that does not include transportation expenses in salary calculation.
■ Minor bug fixes throughout.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Added a button for manually entering the shift.
■ Even if you change the title or location of the shift event, It is no longer excluded from salary calculation.
■ When editing the location of the shift event, you can now select from the list of work.
■ Items were added to the details page of the salary calculation screen.
■ Version upgrade information window was added.
■ Minor bug fixes throughout.

■ Fixed a bug that break time might not be reflected in salary calculation.

■ Application size has been reduced.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Added the function to Remove the Ad Banner.
■ Fixed a bug that when the all day is ON, an error occurs and you can not save changes.
■ We added Automatic Adjustment function to be displayed with the most suitable layout in terminal of all resolutions.
■ Fixed other minor bugs.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ We added local calendar which is not synchronized with iCloud (calendar name: SHIFTAR)
■ "Display holidays" has been added to the setting items. You can turn off the calendar holiday display by turning it off.
■ "Display setting of calendar" was added to the setting item. You can switch on / off for each calendar.
■ "Use iCloud Calendar" was added to the setting item. If you turn it off, you will only use the local calendar.
■ We added item of "holiday" to object of holiday salary.
■ Fixed the problem that the display of "day of the week as holiday" in the holiday salary setting is strange.
■ Operational performance of the app has been improved.
■ We reduced application size.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Added the function to send shift work schedule to other people.
■ The name has been changed from "Set workplace" to "Set salary".
■ We have made it possible to change the break time when editing shift events.
■ It has been made to display both location and notes in the event list.
■ We added item of "display style of holiday" to setting of calendar.
■ Fixed a bug that was added to the shift when you manually enter the shift.
■ Fixed a bug that the day of the week is shifted in the calendar when selecting the date.
■ We added button to change in 1 minute unit / 5 minutes unit when setting time of event.
■ We have been made to display events in order from the one with the earliest start time.
■ The default setting of the break time was changed to 0 when adding a new shift.
■ Performance has been improved.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ We added copy, move function of event.
■ Fixed a display problem that occurs on iPhone X series devices.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ We added setting of display order of events.
■ Fixed a minor bug.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ SHIFTAR Premium service has been launched!
It is a service that can use special functions such as adding event colors and backing up application data.
You can try it for free at first, so please use it!

■ Color palette settings have been added.
It is now possible to rearrange the order of colors and to name and display colors.
■ The number of events that can be displayed on one day has increased.
More events will be displayed on high resolution devices and when you hide ads.
■ Fixed a minor bug.

If you would like to add this kind of function or have trouble with a problem, please feel free to post it anytime from "Others> Opinions / Requests". We'll be expecting you!

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ SHIFTAR Premium service has been launched!
It is a service that can use special functions such as adding event colors and backing up application data.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Added the display settings of the shift.
It is now possible to display events for two days, such as night shift, with the length of one day.
""Others> Calendar settings> Shift display style""

■ We added item of ""overtime work time"" ""overtime work allowance"" on the detailed screen of salary calculation.
(Definition of overtime work: hours worked over specified time, hours worked on holidays)

■ We have made it appear semi-transparent on the calendar screen other than the current month.
■ Fixed a bug that may be displayed one minute shorter than the shift break time setting.
■ We changed to the total that item of late-night work displayed percentage increment on the detail screen of salary calculation.
■ Fixed a bug that working hours may be displayed one minute less than the actual time on the Details tab of the payroll calculation screen.
■ Fixed other minor problems.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Widgets function was added.
Our new widget allows you to quickly check your daily / weekly schedule without having to launch the app.
(SHIFTAR Premium members only)

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ Fixed a bug that the last day was not included in the shift sharing function.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
■ The price of SHIFTAR Premium has been changed.

■ Added a function to change the background color of the date.
Press and hold the date to change the background color.
■ Fixed a bug that included the shift for the current month and the following month when the shift across the closing date was calculated for salary.
■ The break time can be set in 1 minute increments.
■ Adjusted UI color.
■ Added a button that raises the calendar screen during shift input (use this to select the lower date that overlaps the panel)

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・The frequency of payment of salary can be set.
　(Monthly/Twice monthly/Biweekly)

・The layout of the salary calculation screen was reworked.
　・Salary for all workplaces is shown for months.
　・Added a yearly display.

・Fixed a bug in which the calendar screen did not display correctly when a monthly repeating schedule was created between the 29th and 31st.

・Added an ON/OFF item for salary calculation in salary settings.
　When off, salary for the workplace is not calculated.

・Adjusted the UI colors to account for diversity of color vision.
　・Shift input screen
　・Salary calculation screen
　・Adjustments are planned for other screens in the future.
　If any items on the screen are difficult to see,
　please contact us from ""Other > Comments/Requests"".

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・"Calendar" was added to the setting of the event display order.
・Fixed a bug that the delete button of salary setting is not displayed.
・Fixed some texts that were not translated on the salary screen.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・Added ""Sort function"" (Shift / Workplace / Color palette)
・Fixed a bug that the delete button was not displayed on the salary setting screen.
・The display method of today's date has been changed.
・Adjusted the UI colors to account for diversity of color vision.

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・Added the function to specify the amount of salary (SHIFTAR Premium registration required)
・Fixed a bug where the event color was not set in the order of the color palette when the event color was set in the display order of the schedule.
・You can now delete characters from the cursor position when entering characters.

More iOS versions supported!

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・Fixed a color bug in shift events.
・Fixed a bug in the widget.

You can now change the font size!

Thank you for always using the SHIFTAR.
With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・You can now change the font size of the calendar
( Other > Calendar Settings > Font size )
・Fixed a bug that the date display of the widget may be off by one day

・Improved internal processing
・Minor bug fixes

Restoring backups has never been easier!

With the latest version, the following contents were revised.
・Change the file extension of the backup file
